response.overview: Based on an "actual event" that took place in 1943. About a US Navy Destroyer Escort that disappeared from the Philadelphia Naval Shipyard, and sent two men 40 years into the future to 1984.
response.tagline: The experiment that should never have happened 41 years ago...is still going on.
response.title: The Philadelphia Experiment

titles.title: 4차원의 포로
titles.type: 1992-01-05 SBS 일요명화, 1992-12-25 SBS 앙코르 특선영화 방영제목
